name: Spitaler Elfriede und Andreas
description: cosy guesthouse in sunny position with wonderful view to the Zillertal mountains. The skibus takes you directly to the skiing area Ski Zillertal 3000. Best starting point for hiking and mountainbiketours in Summer!
bread roll service, children reduction on request
well removed street (Zillertaler Höhenstraße) to the part Greider, about 4,5 km up from the center

image.caption: Elfriede u. Andreas Spitaler Hippach - Winterbild

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: 75m² big appartement, self contained appartement in a whole floor, livingroom with sleeping possibility and kitchen, fully equipped kitchen with microwace, coffeemachine, Sat-TV, 2 doublerooms, 1 bedroom with four beds (2 additional beds also possible), 2 bedrooms, WC, The appartement is funished in rustical design.
